task.title: how to divide numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions for the division feature of CohnCalc.

prereq.p: To successfully divide numbers, you must know what is multiplication.

result.p: The result from the multiplication is displayed.

example.p: You want to divide 3 by 2. The equation will look like: 3/2=1.5. You enter 3. Press divide (/). Enter 2. Press equals.
The result 1.5 appears on the screen.
